review: Loses connection with our WiFi often, and some of the apps are not working with my cable provider (Comcast/Xfinity).  Its a bit disappointing. review: I have used Roku for a long while now. I got this thinking I would use this and give one of my Roku's to my parents. After using it, I just wanted to give this one away. I will be holding on tight to my Roku's. No offense Amazon, but this is a dud. The interface is awful and not user friendly. I tried it for a few days, but just don't like it. As for my parents. I will not be giving the Fire to my parents. I would rather buy them a Roku.On a positive note. It does what it says it will, but I just can't get past the interface.
